law.text: Nothing in KRS 224.71-100 to 224.71-140 shall be construed as affecting the obligation of any person concerning any permit, certification, or authorization required under state or federal law. Nothing in KRS 224.71-100 to 224.71-140 shall be construed to require the cabinet to give prior written notice in the case of any violation of a permit, certification, or authorization required under state or federal law or in the case of any violation requiring emergency action for violations of KRS 224.10-410, 224.1-400, and 151.297 or enforcement of any administrative or judicial order to protect human health or the environment.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1994.
